entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 29 January 2023
